basic.Source: Morone chrysops x Morone saxatilis (white bass x striped sea-bass)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25,922,351,50 (MIC=22 µM), Escherichia coli ATCC D31K (MIC=11 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10,031 (MIC=22 µM), P. shigelloides ATCC KST (MIC=11 µM), S. flexneri ATCC 12,022 (MIC=22 µM), Shigella sonnei ATCC 9290 (MIC=44 µM), Y. enterocolitica ATCC 23,715 (MIC=22 µM).Fungi:Aspergillus niger (MIC=44 µM).
